channel.title: Governance on Data Automation
channel.description: Recent content in Governance on Data Automation

item.title: The Metaverse post Meta
item.description: Facebook's name change defined a milestone in the history of a technology that’s decades old, but how big is the impact of such change to the development of the metaverse?

item.title: Identity development in the digital space
item.description: After a few decades, many aspects of society were transformed by information technologies, developed and maintained by just a few individuals. What can be done to guarantee that citizens will be involved in the construction of a secure and equal virtual society?
